name: Andrew Gordon
bio:
Andrew Gordon is a trusted cryptocurrency attorney and CPA with a long history of championing the crypto industry. As the founder of Gordon Law Group, he has been immersed in the crypto legal landscape since 2014, guiding numerous blockchain startups and investors through the intricacies of cryptocurrency law.

With a dedication to supporting web3 startups, Andrew provides essential services including business formation, contracts, SEC and FTC compliance, bookkeeping, and tax filing. Andrew is dedicated to supporting the Ethereum community as they grapple with ongoing legal challenges.
